definition: original shape/true appearance (under the disguise)/true character
original identity fully revealed (idiom); fig. to unmask and expose the whole truth

sentences.english: Roxarsone is excreted mostly as its parent drug in animal manure.
sentences.chinese: 洛克沙胂进入动物体后，大部分以原形随粪便排出。

sentences.english: Any detailed investigation would show true colors of the corrupt offical.
sentences.chinese: 任何细致的调查都会使这个贪官原形毕露。

sentences.english: E. g. He had a good disguise, but as soon as he spoke he betrayed himself.
sentences.chinese: 他的伪装很好，可是一说话就原形毕露了。

sentences.english: That puts not only United but English football in its place.
sentences.chinese: 不仅曼联，整个英国足球都被打回了原形。

sentences.english: Action crushes fear, because it demystifies it.
sentences.chinese: 行动可以粉碎恐惧，因为它让恐惧现出原形。

sentences.english: I believe that he will show his true colors someday.
sentences.chinese: 我相信他总有一天会现出原形的。

sentences.english: The very idea of keeping up betrays you.
sentences.chinese: 这种一较高低的念头就使你原形毕露了。

sentences.english: The teacher said today is entered some students in their true form.
sentences.chinese: 老师一进门就是说今天有的同学现原形了。

sentences.english: It is directly proportional to the total amount of unchanged drug that reaches the systemic circulation.
sentences.chinese: 它直接与到达体循环的原形总药量成正比。

sentences.english: They are showing their true colour at the time our great achievement.
sentences.chinese: 我们取得伟大成就的时候，他们就现了原形。

sentences.english: In this case , methyl alcohol will be excreted unmetabolized in the urine.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，甲醇将以原形随尿排除。

sentences.english: I thought he would show the cloven hoof sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 我早就认为他迟早会原形毕露的。

sentences.english: He have a good disguise, but as soon as he speak he betray himself.
sentences.chinese: 他伪装得很好，可是一说话就原形毕露了。

sentences.english: An unrighteous self-styled Messiah would soon have been exposed as a fraud.
sentences.chinese: 其他自称是弥赛亚的人只能很快露出原形。

sentences.english: Orcus' background and origins are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 奥库斯的背景与原形全都不明。

sentences.english: A bronze statue with feet of clay.
sentences.chinese: 与原形毕露的一个古铜色雕像。

definition: human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
to become visible/to appear/to manifest one's true nature
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
to show one's true nature (derog.)/to betray oneself
to change into/to turn into/to become
(of insects) to undergo metamorphosis/(fig.) to be transformed/to metamorphose/to become degraded
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
